name: GraveKeeper (wip)
description:
----------- GRAVE KEEPER -----------

Grave Keeper

the idea was to make a metroidvania style game. As you progress you'll gain new weapons that offer new ways to attack and get around the world. 

Your the grave keeper at the town's ol' cemetery. Lately things have seemed a bit odd however. Now on the night of the full moon, what will rise up? 

Notes: 

  • Options doesn't do anything for now
  • Right now there's a first boss and that's all. 
  • In one of the rooms is a bonus area to get to after defeating the boss. it has some weapons and enemies to mess with. 

Feedback is welcome!
